TopicTitle: Crafts are missing when revert to VAB

Articles.Content: I built a rocket and launch it ,then I revert it to VAB and I couldn't launch it again. When I tried to load the saves of my rockets, it disappear and I can only see the stock crafts

The only way I found to see craft I had built after reverting is to go to the main area and click on the launchpad button in the window to the left showing locations. Then you can see your stuff again. Revert to VAB is actually making this game borderline unplayable. Amazed there hasn't been even a small bug fix update yet.
I made a new save and I don't encounter this bug anymore. It may have to do with the number of crafts you have saved, but that's just speculation.

On 3/6/2023 at 1:51 AM, Snooopy22 said:

I made a new save and I don't encounter this bug anymore. It may have to do with the number of crafts you have saved, but that's just speculation. 

maybe that's,I have saved about 20  crafts it and I haven't test if there is still a this bug in the new version
